summary:
• Type: Share Option Grant
  • Issuer: Oceania Healthcare Limited (NZX: OCA)
  • Options Granted: 3,059,190 (10.6% of total outstanding Options)
  • Exercise Price: NZD $0.65 (VWAP over 5 days prior to 26 May 2025)
  • Exercise Period: 10 business days after 2028 final results announcement, expiring 90 days later
  • Settlement: Cashless (net-settled), with shares issued based on market value vs. exercise price
  • Tax Treatment: OCA pays tax on behalf of holders, with share issuance adjusted for tax differential
  • Purpose: Retention/alignment of CEO and employees with shareholders (no dilution disclosed)
  • Issue Date: 23 June 2025

No material liquidity/dilution impact noted based on current terms.

• Divestment of HTAL stake: Spark selling 10% shareholding in HTAL to Hutchison Telecommunications (Amsterdam) BV.
  • Premium to valuation: Sale price A$0.032/share (45% above Independent Expert's upper valuation range, 39% above 3-month VWAP).
  • Proceeds & use of funds: NZ$47 million expected in July 2025 for net debt reduction.

Omitted: Strategic review boilerplate, contact details, company background.

Takeover Announcement Summary:

  • Acquisition Offer: Shift4 Payments to acquire Smartpay via scheme of arrangement at NZ$1.20/share (cash).
  • Premium: 46.5% to 90-day VWAP (NZ$0.82/share).
  • Implied Equity Value: NZ$296.4m (A$274.1m).

  • EV/EBITDA: ~14.2x FY25 EBITDA (NZ$21.5m).

  • Conditions:

  • Shareholder approval (75% votes required).
  • NZ High Court & Overseas Investment Office consent.

  • No material adverse change (threshold: NZ$5.8m EBITDA impact).

  • Timetable:

  • Scheme Meeting: Q3 2025.

  • Expected Implementation: Q4 2025.

  • Support:

  • Board unanimously recommends (subject to Independent Adviser’s valuation).

  • 13.3% shareholder (Microequities) intends to vote in favor.

  • Exclusivity: "No-shop" clause with break fees of NZ$2.96m each party.

Key trading impact: Premium-priced cash exit offer with clear timeline and shareholder support.

Summary of ASX Announcement:

Drilling Commencement at Bousquet Gold Project

  • Drilling Program Started: Initial phase of 2,400m (10 holes) at Paquin and Decoeur Prospects.
  • Approvals Secured: Up to 10,000m (38 holes) permitted across high-priority targets.
  • High-Grade Potential: Paquin Prospect includes intercepts like 9m @ 16.96g/t Au.
  • Strategic Location: Project situated on the Cadillac Break, a gold-endowed structure (>110Moz Au historically).

No material trading/capital markets impacts identified (operational update only).
